name: Maxomorra - Underwear
description:
Adorable little boxer briefs or hipster undies in a rainbow of colors and tons of fun and fantastic prints.

Boxer Briefs: Bats, Formula 1 (black), clouds, petrol and orange stripes, dinosaurs, space, race cars (blue), foxes

Hipsters: Horses, zigzags, foxes, pink and purple stripes, apples, owls, flamingos, polka dots, clouds

GOTS certified, 95% organic cotton with 5% elastane for perfect fit.

options.name: Blue Race Cars Boxer Briefs - 5-6 years

name: Abrams - Iggy Peck, Architect
description:
A hilarious, irreverent book about doing your own thing.

Meet Iggy Peck—creative, independent, and not afraid to express himself! This book will delight readers looking for irreverent, inspired fun. 

Iggy has one passion: building. His parents are proud of his fabulous creations, though they’re sometimes surprised by his materials—who could forget the tower he built out of diapers? When his second-grade teacher declares her dislike of architecture, Iggy faces a challenge. He loves building too much to give it up! With Andrea Beaty’s irresistible rhyming text and David Roberts’s puckish illustrations, this book will charm creative kids everywhere, and amuse their sometimes bewildered parents.

name: Tuff Kookooshka - Fleece Hats
description:
Warm, snuggly Polartec fleece hats. All sizes feature ear covers; Velcro chin strap on sizes 2T and smaller. Made in Massachusetts.

Zaika - Funny little gray bunny hat with red and blue striped ears, button eyes, and goofy rabbit teeth

Buster - Two-toned monster hat with button eyes and pointy teeth, available in pool (bright blue) and red or grey and navy blue

Dino - Spiked dinosaur hat with fuzzy grey boucle exterior

Luchador - Wrestler/ super hero mask hat, in bright red or navy blue

name: Tuff Kookooshka - Fleece Coats
description:
Snuggly, warm Polartec fleece snap-front jackets, perfect as an outer layer. Made in Massachusetts. Sized for layering over sweaters, etc; a slightly roomier fit.

Aviator - Brown fleece with pilot's goggles and propeller airplane detail at front. Grey piping and blue fringe on hood.

Luchador - Navy jacket with wrestler's mask hood and lightning bolt applique at front. Red piping and fringe on hood.

Super Girl - Hot pink jacket with superhero mask hood and star badge at front. Purple trim and fringe on hood.

name: Hansel from Basel - Socks
description:
Adorable socks in gorgeous colors and fun patterns for kids & babies. 

Diamond Crew - Color blocked in royal blue, ivory, and salmon

Stripe Crew - Available in subtle mustard with thin grey stripes or coral with taupe stripes

Strawberry Crew - Bright red sock with bright green "leaf" ankle and yellow "seed" polka dots (this style runs big; we suggest sizing down)

Pineapple Crew - Crisscrossed, diamond detail on deep yellow body & green zig-zag "leaf" ankle, heel and toe

Wrestler Anklet - Ankle sock with little luchador design, in bright red or lime green

70% organic cotton, 27% polyester, 3% spandex

name: Hansel from Basel - Tights & Leggings
description:
Soft opaque tights and leggings in a gorgeous, sophisticated palette. Sizing runs a little large; particularly between sizes, you may wish to size down.

Cone Leggings - Heather grey with white, yellow, orange, and black cones

Kneepad CB Leggings - Deep green with one navy and one ivory oval over knees

Nautical Stripe - Brown with skinny pink stripes and green contrast heel & toe, or ivory with thin blue stripes and coral contrast heel & toe

Pixie Tights - Soft taupe with fun black color blocking

Rib Stripe Tights - Deep berry tights with contrast ivory vertical ribbing and horizontal stripes

Polka Dot Tights - Deep tan tights with soft, fuzzy, pale pink polka dots


70% organic cotton, 27% polyester, 3% spandex

name: Boys & Girls - Super Star Frill Sleeve Tee
description:
A soft & stretchy tee with all-over multi-colored stars. Cute retro shape with fill sleeve detail and snaps at side of neck for easy dressing.

100% organic cotton, GOTS and Fairtrade certified

name: Boys & Girls - Harem Sweatpants
description:
Soft sweats in super-cozy brushed fleece with deep rib cuffs which can be turned back for growth, and wide leg shape for a relaxed fit.
Perfect for babies and big boys and girls alike.

Decorative drawstring tie at waist in sizes 12-24 months to 3-4 years; functioning drawstring in sizes 4-5 years and up.

100% GOTS certified organic cotton

name: Boys & Girls - Star Bright Crew Sweatshirt
description:
The star-filled crew in super-cozy brushed fleece is a season essential. With all-over multi-color stars, contrast stitch detail and deep rib cuffs for the perfect fit. For babies and big boys and girls alike. Goes with anything! Sizes 3-6 and 6-12 months snap at back of neck for easy dressing.

100% organic cotton, GOTS certified

name: Boys & Girls Star Bight Dress
description:
The Star Bright Dress in grey marl with multi-colored star print is bright & fun. An easy pull-on shape in super-cozy brushed sweat with deep rib cuffs for a great fit. Sizes 3-6 and 6-12 months snap at back of neck for easy dressing.

100% organic cotton, GOTS certified

name: Mini Rodini - Fox Onesie
description:
Comfortable hooded jumpsuit in cute all over fox print made from organic cotton. The color is a classic grey melange and is filled with fabulous foxes. A perfect every day piece for the little ones!

Features zipper from neckline to bottom leg for easy dressing, soft ribs at sleeve and ankle, and hood with two seams for perfect comfort and fit.

Composition: 95% cotton 5% spandex. GOTS certified

name: Mini Rodini - Star Baby Helmet
description:
Super cute pilot hat in dark blue with all-over shooting stars, made from soft terry blend. One size, fits approximately 0-6 months.

Composition: 52% modal 48% organic cotton. OE Blended certified

name: Mini Rodini - Star Onesie
description:
Comfortable hooded jumpsuit in lovely all-over shooting stars print, in soft terry blend. The color is a dark navy with bright white stars. A perfect every day piece for the little ones!

Features zipper from neckline to bottom leg for easy dressing, soft ribs at sleeve and ankle, and hood with two seams for perfect comfort and fit.

Composition: 52% modal 48% organic cotton. OE Blended certified

name: Mini Rodini - Star Sweatshirt
description:
Stylish sweatshirt with shooting stars print in comfy, drapey terry. Features soft ribs at cuff hem, and neck for perfect comfort and fit. Snaps at neck for easy dressing.

Composition: 52% modal 48% organic cotton. OE Blended certified

name: Mini Rodini - Star Dress
description:
Soft and stylish dress in dark blue with shooting stars print. Made in a soft, drapey blended terry sweatshirt material, with long sleeves and lovely tiered skirt. Features soft rib and drawstring at waist for perfect fit and comfort. As cute as comfortable, to wear every single day.

Note: tie at waist is white, as seen in flat image.

Composition: 52% modal 48% organic cotton. OE Blended certified

name: Modeerska Huset - Up & Above Jumpsuit
description:
Soft jumpsuit in 100% GOTS certified organic cotton. Green stitching, collar trim and cuffs at ankle; snaps down front and left leg for easy dressing. Dreamy green and turquoise celestial print on natural, features sky scene with suns, stars, clouds, planes, carrier doves, little mustachioed men, and banners that read, "I (Heart) My Dad."

Warm wash inside out; fabric may shrink slightly in the first wash. Centimeters indicate child length for the corresponding size.

name: Modeerska Huset - Reversible Baby Bonnet
description: Pilot cap in 100% GOTS certified organic cotton jersey interlock. Hat reverses to contrast pattern inside and can be used both ways! Pica Pica - Deep blue with turquoise trim and stitching, features child with magpie print-- Pica pica is the Latin name for magpie. Reverses to Up & Above print, with green stitching. Up and Above - Dreamy green and turquoise celestial print on natural with green trim and stitching. Features sky scene with suns, stars, clouds, planes, carrier doves, little mustachioed men, and banners that read, "I (Heart) My Dad." Reverses to The Baltic print (islands with hillside houses and trees, ferries and swans on the water, and "The Baltic Sea" banners) with peach stitching. Wash at 40°C. Use a mild detergent for colored/printed garments.

name: Modeerska Huset - Kimono & Pants Set
description: This bundle includes a wraparound, kimono-style bodysuit, carefully constructed to fit a diaper, and baby leggings with soft rib at waist and cuffs. GOTS-certified, 100% organic cotton jersey featuring one of three prints, inspired by Swedish designer Jenny Modeer's beloved father. Pica Pica - Deep blue with turquoise trim and stitching, features child with magpie print-- Pica pica is the Latin name for magpie. The Baltic - Blue & green with peach trim and stitching, features islands with hillside houses and trees, ferries and swans on the water, and "The Baltic Sea" banners. Up and Above - Dreamy green and turquoise celestial print on natural with green trim and stitching. Features sky scene with suns, stars, clouds, planes, carrier doves, little mustachioed men, and banners that read, "I (Heart) My Dad." Warm wash inside out; fabric may shrink slightly in the first wash. Centimeters indicate child length for the corresponding size.

name: Winter Water Factory - French Terry Jumpsuit
description: Warm and cozy, and made from super soft 100% organic cotton french terry. Made with love in Brooklyn.

name: Skylar Luna - Long-Sleeved Pajamas
description:
Lovingly crafted from Turkish organic cotton to be soft and cuddly against little bodies, these PJs are set apart by their contemporary palette and fresh California feel. A close-fitting, two-piece style enables ease of movement, and flat interior seams keep kids comfy. Skylar Luna is eco-friendly sleepwear for the trendsetters of tomorrow. Uniquely packaged in a reusable linen pouch, Skylar Luna provides peace of mind by meeting Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) guidelines for children’s sleepwear. Available in several prints:
  • Bright butterflies
  • Retro cars
  • Pink & red floral
  • lilies in subtle pinks and greens
  • Monsters with striped teal, green, and gold bottoms
  • Nautical print (octopus, anchor, ship's wheel, sailing ship)
  • Red with silver stars
  • Navy with green & white stars
  • Purple with grey stripes
  • Red with skinny grey stripes
  • Gray with thick black and thin red stripes

name: Mini & Maximus - Hit the Road Raglan Tee
description:
Long-sleeved raglan t-shirt in soft 100% organic cotton. Slightly longer, curved back hem. Features red bandit print on sleeves. Made in USA.

Mini & Maximus was born from a love for art, the environment, creativity, and the idealism of youth. They want to encourage self-expression, the unexpected, and never growing old.

name: Mini & Maximus - Short-Sleeved Tee
description:
Crew neck t-shirt in deliciously soft 100% organic cotton. Made in USA. Available in Le Meow (large cat print on beige), Meow Meow (all-over cat print on teal), and Zig Zag (on olive green).

Mini & Maximus was born from a love for art, the environment, creativity, and the idealism of youth. They want to encourage self-expression, the unexpected, and never growing old.

name: Uncle Goose - Classic Alphabet Blocks - Various Languages
description: Made in Michigan from sustainable, local basswood, these classic Alphabet Blocks come in an array of languages. English ABC set comes with a bag for storage. Don't see your language? Contact us for more information about special orders. 1.75" cubes (44mm), recommended for ages 2+

name: Uncle Goose - Specialty Blocks
description: Made in Michigan of sustainable local basswood. Uppercase/Lowercase ABC Blocks This set is quality with a capital Q, and includes a little extra something. 14 modern blocks feature big, bold lettering in both uppercase and lowercase, with bright colors to draw a child’s attention. One complete embossed uppercase alphabet and one complete printed lowercase alphabet with some extra vowels thrown in for spelling names or Hawaiian words. 14 cubes, 1.75" (44mm) Nursery Rhyme Blocks Hickory, dickory, block. These Nursery Rhyme blocks, in a full set of 28 blocks or a smaller "best of" collection, are attractive, educational, and fun, and make a great baby shower or birthday gift. Each block is embossed with two silhouette images from Mother Goose stories, with the nursery rhyme text on the other four sides. 9 or 28 cubes, 1.75" (44mm) Groovie Math Blocks Groovies are used to help teach children sorting, ordering, opposites, and patterns. This set contains 28 grooved blocks with debossed numbers, math symbols, geometric shapes corresponding to the number on the opposite side, and an activity booklet. 28 cubes, 1.75" (44mm) Ant Antics Blocks These blocks go marching four by four, hurrah, hurrah! Trails of ants connect on all six sides of these sixteen blocks, forming never-ending patterns for your kids to explore. Each set contains images of ant hills, a queen with her eggs, and a spider, the ant's nemesis. 16 cubes, 1.75" (44mm)

name: Imps & Elfs - Pan Collar Tree Dress
description:
The sweetest dress in 100% organic cotton sateen, with a painterly all-over nature print. Buttons at sleeve and back of neck, back zip closure, elasticized drop waist. Available in Icy Grey and Storm (navy blue).

GOTS certified 100% organic cotton

name: Imps & Elfs - Footed Leggings
description:
Heavyweight, super-opaque tights, a cold-weather must. Available in Jellybean (electric coral), Cinnamon/Green (warm brown and jungle green), and Frost/Storm (pale blue and navy).

85% organic cotton, 15% polyamide, 5% elastane

name: Imps & Elfs - Super Hero Tee
description:
Super soft t-shirt, fit for a superhero. Snaps at shoulder up to size 12-18 months for easier dressing.

Steel blue with yellow & black graphic: 60% organic cotton, 40% polyester, certifed to OE Blended Standard
Light blue melange with blue graphic: 100% organic cotton, GOTS certified

Note: This style runs slim; particularly if your child is between sizes, we suggest that you size up.

name: Imps & Elfs - Raglan Sweater
description:
Soft, middle-weight pullover, with ribbed details and buttons at neck for easier dressing. A perfect layering piece, in chocolate brown and royal blue.

100% organic cotton, GOTS certified

name: Imps & Elfs - Sweater Trousers
description:
Soft, middle-weight knit pants, with elastic waistband and ribbed details at waist, cuff, and sides. Available in chocolate brown and royal blue.

100% organic cotton, GOTS certified

name: Imps & Elfs - Bear Tee
description:

name: Phaidon - Doodle Cook
description:
Welcome, young art-chefs – your moment has come! The table is set and your ingredients await: an empty plate, markers or crayons and – most important of all – your imagination! Now, add a dash of squiggles there, a handful of zig zags for flavor... and voila!

Here are 17 art-recipes, created by a master chef (author and illustrator Hervé Tullet). Follow the recipes and learn how to create a scribble sandwich, a thousand layer cake and chef's surprise... and then add your own decoration to taste.  

Paperback, 13 5/8" x 9 7/8", 48 pp 
Black-and-white illustrations  

<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/bG-UHwPbZfk" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: Abrams - The Book with a Hole
description: The Book with a Hole blasts a hole through the middle of the book itself. Sometimes the hole is an eye the reader can look through; sometimes it is a mouth and the reader's fingers make the teeth! The next minute it is a plate (with food drawn by the reader on a sheet of paper behind the book), an obstacle to jump across, or a saucepan. It's crazy! It's a Book with a Hole! Packed full of Hervé Tullet's zany drawings and inventive ideas, this is bound to enchant children of all ages. Paperback, 10 7/8" x 12 5/8", 96 pp Black-and-white illustrations

name: Phaidon - Herve Tullet Game Books
description: Hervé Tullet studied fine art and worked as an art director before joining the advertising industry. In 1994 he published his first book for children and has since become one of the world’s most innovative book makers. Known in France as ‘The Prince of pre-school books’, Tullet takes the concept of reading to a new level, teaching young minds to think imaginatively, independently and creatively. The Game of Finger Worms A fun and lively game for young children, introducing them to the vivid imaginary world at their fingertips. Perfect to occupy busy minds and little fingers! To play this interactive game, all you need is the tip of your finger! Take a pen and draw on two eyes and a mouth... and there you have it, your very own finger worm! The Finger Circus Game A circus-themed follow-up to The Game of Finger Worms; trapeze artists, clowns and lion tamers will come to life in front of your child’s amazed eyes! The Game of Red, Yellow, and Blue A fun way of learning the basics of color mixing for young children. The Game in the Dark Travel to the moon, dance with the stars, bounce around the universe-- without leaving your bedroom! The Game in the Dark is a book that glows in the dark, and transforms your world. Printed with glow-in-the-dark ink, children will journey on a rocket to the moon and stars. Charge the book up under a light source to bring the magic universe to life. The Game of Shadows There’s a noise in the garden. Who could that be? Creatures hidden in the bushes? A lost wolf? Let’s go and see! In the dark, shine a flashlight through the die-cut pages and help amazing and mysterious shadows come to life.

options.name: The Game of Red, Yellow, & Blue

name: Abrams - How to Be a Cat
description: In cut-paper artist Nikki McClure’s latest picture book, a kitten practices the basics of feline behavior over the course of a day. A single word of text per spread teaches readers “how to be a cat”—how to stretch, clean, pounce, feast—while the striking paper cuts illustrate the kitten’s attempts to imitate an adult cat’s mastery of each skill. At times the kitten triumphantly succeeds, and at other times the kitten struggles, in vignettes that range from whimsical to profound. A celebration of all things feline, How to Be a Cat also tells a universal story of mastering life skills, and of the sometimes tender, sometimes stern relationship between parent and child, teacher and pupil. Cat lovers of all ages will connect to this loving portrayal of a mentor-student relationship.

name: Abrams - 365 Penguins
description: The family in Jean-Luc Fromental's 365 Penguins find a penguin mysteriously delivered to their door every day for a year. At first they’re cute, but with every passing day, the penguins pile up—along with the family’s problems. Feeding, cleaning, and housing the penguins becomes a monumental task. They’re noisy and smelly, and they always hog the bathroom! And who on earth is sending these kwaking critters? In a large format, and with lots of opportunity for counting, 365 Penguins is sure to become a perennial favorite. Featuring illustrations by acclaimed artist Joëlle Jolivet. Hardcover, 10 3/4" x 14 1/6", 48 pp Full-color illustrations throughout

name: Abrams - Oops!
description: In a distinctive oversize package and illustrated with Joëlle Jolivet’s signature retro, eye-catching style, Jean-Luc Fromental's Oops! follows a family through the streets of Paris as they try to get to the airport for their vacation. Back at their apartment, their house-sitting aunt slips on some soap, setting off a chain reaction of events that create some extreme roadblocks for the family’s trip. A movie shoot, a parade, policemen, rampaging bears, aliens, and much more collide in this remarkable new picture book adventure. The book includes a gatefold page at the end that explains in detail the train of chaos on the previous pages.

name: Abrams - Rapido's Next Stop
description: The latest from Joelle Jolivet and Jean-Luc Fromental, the bestselling duo behind 365 Penguins, this book follows Rapido the messenger and his van throughout the city as he delivers packages. Clever flaps on every page give hints into people’s lives and clues as to what he’s delivering, and where. The objects that Rapido delivers are represented as symbols, which readers can decipher from the setting and the rhyme. To help with the clues, a packing list of all the objects in Rapido’s truck is provided on the title page. It’s an interactive treat that celebrates city life and transportation, and that features the striking art that has made Jolivet an international sensation.

name: Abrams - When I Was Born
description: All children love to hear the story of how they arrived in the world. Isabel Minhós Martins' When I Was Born revisits the adventure of discovering the world for the first time. Breathing, seeing, hearing, tasting, and touch are encountered afresh in this beautifully illustrated, poetic tale, reintroducing readers to the richness and delight of life. Children and adults alike will love award-winning illustrator Madalena Matoso's colorful and touching images, accompanied by a text that is ideal for reading aloud.

name: Abrams - At Our House
description: Counting is fun, but it’s a lot more fun when you can count things like fingers and tongues and freckles. Isabel Minhós Martins' At Our House is a charming adventure through the eyes of one household and the bodies that are in it. Vibrantly illustrated by Madalena Matoso, each page counts up the number of toes and teeth, and even length of intestines children might find in their own family, in a hilarious story that children will love. Hardcover, 7 7/8" x 8 7/8", 28 pp Color illustrations throughout

name: Abrams - Up Close
description:
Recognizing and labeling animals has never been so geometrically inspired! Young children will delight in the usual suspects (bunny, pig, frog, chicken, monkey, and lion) depicted in a whole new way. The elements of each zoomed-in face provide only a subtle hint of the animals’ identities, inviting children (and adults!) to stretch the boundaries of what defines an animal image. The simple question-and-answer format provides immediate gratification for even the shortest attention spans.

Board book, 8" x 8", 30 pp
Full-color illustrations throughout

name: Abrams - Now I Am Big!
description:
Children and parents alike will delight in this joyous declaration of toddler independence. This book celebrates the feats of growing out of babyhood and starting to embrace the world on your own terms. Whether it’s being tall enough to reach a high shelf or brave enough to splash in the waves, auther Stephen Krensky and illustrator Sara Gillingham address the small victories that come with growing just a little bit older. Energetic text and retro-fresh illustrations celebrate this important developmental stage with charm and relevance.

Note: illustrations are in the style of vintage screen prints, with imperfect variations in color and texture.

Board book, 6.5" x 9", 12pp
Full-color illustrations throughout

name: Phaidon - Jonathan and Martha
description:
Using his signature style of eye-catching illustration, collage and simple narrative, award winning children’s author, Petr Horáček weaves together a story of friendship between two lonely worms, Jonathan and Martha. A classic story that will teach young children about the importance of sharing and the value of friendship.
Simple narrative and catchy rhythm make this perfect for reading out loud.

Hardback
250 x 230 mm, 9 7/8 x 9 in
32 pp
16 colour illustrations

name: Phaidon - The Onion’s Great Escape
description:

Sara Fanelli's activity book, an exciting first for Phaidon Press, asks young readers to help the onion break free by answering thought-provoking questions and completing the activities within, finally pressing a three-dimensional character right out of the pages.

name: Ammo Books - Modern Art Board Books
description: An ideal gift for a new generation of art lovers! CHARLEY HARPER 123S by Gloria Fowler In this book, counting from 1 to 10 is demonstrated through a colorful and playful range of creatures. From 1 Ladybug Lounging to 2 Birds Nesting and 3 Chimpanzees Playing, all the animals featured are active, delightful, and easy to count. Minimal, bold, and graphic in its design and layout, the 123s is a very sweet tribute to the late, great Charley Harper and his inspiring world of animals and nature. CHARLEY HARPER ABCS by Gloria Fowler The Charley Harper ABCs skinny edition is a kids' board book in a condensed format featuring many additional illustrations and a similar graphic layout. This book is perfect for reading to babies and pre-schoolers as well as challenging budding, young readers who will enjoy learning the alphabet through Charley's illustrations of the animal kingdom. It includes a brief story about Charley Harper and how he began drawing as a young boy on the farm where he grew up. Colorful images like R is for Rabbit, S is for Squirrel, and T is for Turtle, make identifying letters and animals memorable and fun. CHARLEY HARPER COLORS by Gloria Fowler This lovely book helps youngsters identify colors through vivid illustrations that capture their imagination. Early readers can also recognize the written names of the colors, as each one is spelled out in its corresponding color. Charley Harper’s bold and simple illustrations will engage the young toddler’s imaginations. Featuring some of Harper’s classic birds and including other rare images, this book is a visual treat. ALEXANDER GIRARD COLOR by Gloria Fowler This board book celebrates the vivid, playful, and sophisticated world of 20th century design icon Alexander Girard. Especially known for his textile designs for Herman Miller, Girard’s wide-ranging repertoire also spanned many disciplines, including interior design, graphic design, and furniture design. Pre-schoolers learning to identify colors will enjoy this charming little book and its whimsical illustrations. Savvy adults will also love the vintage illustrations and sophisticated design! ABC IS FOR CIRCUS by Patrick Hruby ABC is for Circus celebrates the colorful and festive world of the circus through each letter of the alphabet. Young children will enjoy memorizing letters and words like A is for Acrobats, B is for Big Top, and C is for Calliope in this imaginative chunky board book. As a young boy, Patrick Hruby dreamt of running away to join the circus and become a trapeze artist. Eventually, however, he grew up to study math and physics before attending the renowned Art Center College of Design and pursuing a career as an illustrator. His interest in the geometry of nature is central to his work. Influenced by artists and designers such as Charley Harper, Paul Rand, and Mary Blair, Hruby has gone on to develop his own stunning and modern aesthetic. COUNTING IN THE GARDEN illustrations by Patrick Hruby, written by Emily Hruby Counting in the Garden celebrates the joy of growing flowers, fruits, and vegetables in one’s very own garden. This chunky board book is a visual feast from one to twelve. Young children will love finding and counting all of the garden treats. Every other page introduces a new plant into the mix until ultimately all twelve plants are featured together in the final, abundantly overgrown garden. COUNTING IN THE GARDEN is sure to appeal to eco-conscious parents and their “green” little kids! Brother and sister team Patrick and Emily Hruby collaborated on this charming little book. As kids growing up in a log cabin in the woods of Idaho, they were raised loving the abundant nature all around them. Emily often made up poetic stories for Patrick’s imaginative drawings. As Los Angeles transplants, they each continue to pursue their respective passions for writing and illustrating. This is their first book together.

options.name: Patrick Hruby's ABC is for Circus - Chunky
Patrick Hruby's Counting in the Garden - Chunky

name: Ammo Books - Modern Art Memory Games
description:
A delightful game for all ages featuring colorful illustrations from Charley Harper, Alexander Girard, or Patrick Hruby. This classic game is packaged in a minimal and elegant box with side thumb cuts. It looks great, so you won't mind if it's left out on your coffee table!

How to play: For younger children, play with nine pairs or fewer. For a more challenging game, geared toward older children and adults, play with all 36 pairs. Mix and spread cards face down. Players take turns flipping any two cards up. If cards match, player continues. If cards do not match, player's turn ends and cards remain in the same position. When all cards are matched, player with the most pairs wins. (For even younger kids, try face-up matching!)

name: Tegu - Magnetic Blocks - Cars
description: With 10 classic Tegu Blocks, a signature magnetic styling top, and 4 magnetic wooden wheels, these vehicles integrate seamlessly with the existing line of Tegu blocks. Includes 15 pieces in 5 shapes: 4 long planks, 4 short planks, 4 magnetic wooden wheels, 2 cubes, and 1 styling top Origin: Designed in the USA, purposefully made in Honduras. Materials: Eco-friendly, FSC-certified Honduran hardwoods; safe, non-toxic, water-based lacquers (for colors and clear coats). As a vertically-integrated company, Tegu intimately knows its supply chain and suppliers. Size: Package dimensions are 6 x 4 x 4 inches. Weight is 0.5 lbs. Individual block sizes: Cube is 1.18 x 1.18 x 1.18 in. Short plank is 2.36 x 1.18 x .3 in. Long plank is 4.72 x 1.18 x .3 in. Wheels have a 1.5 in diameter. Ages 3+ Warning: This product contains small magnets. Swallowed magnets can cause complications leading to serious infections and death. Seek immediate medical attention if magnets are swallowed or inhaled.

name: Tegu - Magnetic Blocks - Pocket Pouch
description: The Pocket Pouch is the perfect introduction to the world of Tegu magnetic wooden blocks. It's the perfect toy for the purse, restaurant, airplane, or desk. All sizes safe for ages 0+. Origin: Designed in the USA, purposefully made in Honduras. Materials: Eco-friendly, FSC-certified Honduran hardwoods; safe, non-toxic, water-based lacquers (for colors and clear coats). The pouch is industrial felt. As a vertically-integrated company, Tegu intimately knows its supply chain and suppliers. Original Pocket Pouch Includes 8 blocks in 2 shapes: 4 cubes, 4 short planks Size: With blocks connected, total dimensions are 4.875 x 3.75 x 2 in. Total weight is 0.375 lbs. Individual Block Sizes: Cube is 1.18 x 1.18 x 1.18 in. Short plank is 2.36 x 1.18 x 0.3 in. Pocket Pouch Prism Includes 6 blocks in 2 shapes: 4 triangular prisms, 2 parallelograms Size: With blocks connected, total dimensions are 4.875 x 3.75 x 2 in. Total weight is 0.375 lbs. Individual Block Sizes: Triangular prism is 2.36 x 1.18 x 1.18 in. Parallelogram is 1.5 x 1.18 x 0.82 in. Warning: This product contains small magnets. Swallowed magnets can cause complications leading to serious infections and death. Seek immediate medical attention if magnets are swallowed or inhaled.

name: Fidoodle - Organic Cotton Rattle
description:
Soft and fluffy rattle made of organic cotton sherpa. Can be washed in a warm cycle. Packaged in a sweet screen printed box to make an excellent little package for a brand new baby. Made with care in Canada.

Materials: organic cotton, wool felt (moose antlers, baby bird beak & feet), polyfill

name: Fidoodle - DIY Creature Kit
description:
All the parts are here. All you need is a pair of scissors. 

Using cardboard cut-outs and familiar widgets like chicago screws and hex nuts, you can construct your very own creature. Use the pen and crayons to breathe life into it and top it off with felt ears, antlers, or maybe a bon chapeau. Instructions are included on the bottom of the box. 

If you're curious about its construction, have a look at Fidoodle's delightful animated video! 


<iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/8QGn2JlavJU" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: Fidoodle - Puzzle Blocks
description:
Fidoodle's blocks are hand-printed with illustrations of life in various settings & seasons. You can build, stack and display them any way you like! They source the maple wood for all of their blocks from the off-cuts of a local flooring company. When the blocks are flipped over, they form a puzzle!

Each block set comes with a cotton bag to store the blocks in. Recommended for ages 1+.

All Fidoodle's objects are handmade in Toronto, Canada.

name: Fidoodle - Butterfly Flip Doll
description:
This 9" doll is both girl and butterfly.

Its dress is screen-printed with illustrations of a monarch butterfly- a little hint to this doll's secret. When you reverse the doll's dress (as shown in the photos), you uncover a monarch butterfly.

The doll's hair is made of 98% wool felt and the faces are painted and sealed with a child-safe sealer.

name: Lululuvs - Bow Hair Clips
description: Felt-lined (to maintain their shape) with alligator clip backing. Bows measure about 3" across and 2.5" tall at the widest point. Constructed of organic or Oeko-Tex Standard 100 certified fabrics. Handmade with love in Brooklyn.

name: Guava Kids - Guava Mitts
description:
These soft, sweet mitts are a cute and cozy way to protect babies from their own super-sharp nails before they get the hang of controlling their little arms!

Stay-put protection: Signature two-part closure system keeps scratches and germs at bay and adjusts to fit

Gentle on the Earth: Knit of a bamboo/organic cotton blend that's breathable, antimicrobial, and sustainably harvested

Engage baby's senses & look good: Reversible prints that are stylishly modern on one side, black & white on the other, promoting baby's brain and eye development

- 70% viscose from bamboo / 30% organic cotton blend for mitten body
- 100% cotton for prints
- S/M: 6-15 lbs

name: Kid Basix - Safe Sporter
description:
In a world awash in plastic bottles, The Safe Sporter is a leap forward with a well-thought-out, sustainable and utilitarian design. It is our small contribution to a healthier, greener world. The Safe Sporter bottle features:

- Available in 12 or 16 ounce sizes, perfect for kids’ lunchboxes
- Single-walled design to make it light weight, maximize capacity and lower carbon footprint
- BPA- and phthalate-free
- Wide mouth for easy cleaning and ice cube use
- Hinged mud cap, to keep the spout clean
- Easy pull sports spout
- TPR sleeve to protect hands from cold liquids
- Plastic coaster to protect the bottle from dents
- Dishwasher safe

name: Kid Basix - Safe Sippy 2
description:
The Safe Sippy2 bottle is a 2-in-1 sippy-to-straw drink cup for kids, with tons of great features: 

- No-spill sippy valve and a straw and adapter that instantly converts the cup from sippy to straw bottle. It is the only 2-in-1 cup on the market!
- Travel cap for keeping the spout clean
- Travel plug to ensure no leaks when the cup is being carried in a purse or diaper bag
- 11 ounce volume
- 304 food-grade stainless steel vessel
- BPA- and phthalate-free
- Colorful, protective TPR sleeve that provides insulation against cold liquids and acts as a cushion to protect the cup (and furniture) from denting and banging
- Straw-shaped spout; research has shown that the straw design is better for physical and speech development of kids
- Removable handles
- Dishwasher safe

name: SoYoung - Lunch Box
description:
Nothing makes a child feel more like a big kid than the first lunch box they can call their very own. SoYoung's are made of coated linen and have a clean, modern feel with a palette of retro-inspired designs (dinosaur, giraffe, biplane, rocket ship, elephant, or scooter) to suit every taste. Wear it backpack or messenger style for hands-free adventure outings!
Every SoYoung cooler bag and lunch box now comes with a leak-proof insulated insert for easy cleaning and to help avoid staining from spills.

Material: Coated linen
Bag Features: Detachable long strap for wearing as messenger bag or backpack, easy clean removable insert, easy to clean interior, velcro loop in carrying handle to attach to backpack
Made With Care: Lead-safe, pthalate- and PVC-free
Bag Compartments:	Extra back pocket for cutlery, napkins, or artwork, name tag
Bag Dimensions: 10" W x 7.5" H x 3" D

name: SoYoung - Small Cooler Bag
description:
Why should kids have all the fun? These insulated bags are great for grownups and kiddos alike. Use one as a bottle bag for baby, pack your child’s drinks and snacks in it, or leave the kids at home and take your lunch with you wherever you go. Need an extra hand? These versatile bags can be snapped onto stroller handlebars or worn in either messenger or backpack style with an adjustable, removable strap. The velcro closure on its carrying handle allows it to be attached to the lunchbox loop on coordinating Grade Schooler Backpacks.

SoYoung's cooler bags and lunch boxes now come with a leak proof insulated insert for easy cleaning and to help avoid staining from spills. 

Material: Coated linen
Bag Features: Detachable long strap for wearing as messenger bag or backpack, easy clean removable insert, easy to clean interior
Made With Care: Lead-safe, pthalate- and PVC-free
Bag Compartments: Extra back pocket for cutlery, napkins, or artwork
Bag Dimensions: 4.5" W x 7" H x 7.5" D

name: SoYoung - Toddler Backpack Lunchbox
description:
Designed to please not just the toddler but their parents too! Upright positioning of lunch bag allows for sippy cup and snack containers for young children without spilling. Detachable snaps allow for easy storage in the fridge. Easily attaches to lunch box loops on SoYoung backpacks.

Material: Laminated linen exterior coated with EVA, nylon-lined interior
Bag Features: Top carrying handle, insulated interior, loops to snap onto SoYoung toddler or grade school backpack, interior name tag
Made With Care: PVC-, pthalate-, and BPA-Free
Bag Dimension: 10" W x 7.5" H x 3" D

name: SoYoung - Grade School Backpack
description:
The Grade Schooler Backpack has ample room for large binders, gym clothes and books with room to spare.

Laminated linen exterior with a nylon-lined interior, with two side insulated bottle pockets and a chest clip to keep the bag securely on while skipping, jumping, and running. Loop at front makes it easy to attach a lunch box or cooler.

Material: Laminated linen exterior coated with EVA, nylon-lined interior
Bag Features: Chest clip, interior zippered mesh pocket, reinforced bottom, two insulated bottle pockets, name tag, lunch box loop
Made With Care: PVC-, pthalate-, and BPA-free
Bag Dimensions: 11"W x 16"H x 8"D

name: Ammo Books - Kid Made Modern
description:
Designer Todd Oldham shares his love and admiration of Mid-Century design ideas in this book, focused on creative, colorful, and thoughtful projects for kids—from a cardboard box fort inspired by architect Luis Barragán to window deocrations made from painted paper inspired by designer Russel Wright. One part design primer and two parts handmade fun, Kid Made Modern introduces kids to Mid-Century design heroes with fifty-two playful, simple-to-make craft projects. Featuring inexpensive, easily accessible, and often recycled materials with clear photography and easy-to-follow steps—kids and parents alike will have fun with the projects and find the information about designers educational as well. 

Design icons featured in Kid Made Modern include:

Luis Barragán
Alexander Calder
Charles and Ray Eames
Alexander Girard
Isamu Noguchi
Paul Rand
Eva Zeisel
And many others!

name: Kidsonroof - People of the World
description:
Twelve persons from various parts of the world, each of them wonderfully dressed and unique. Let them come alive, tell their stories and meet each other.

12 thick cardboard sheets of 15cm x 15cm. Made from recycled cardboard. Age 3+.

name: Camden Rose - Knitting Tower
description:
This birch knitting tower enables young children (and adult beginners!) to practice the essentials of knitting. Children can begin to knit right away, as the birch wood tower holds the stitches while their fingers freely move the yarn. Best part of all is the choice between a tight stitch 6-pin knot or a stretchy stitch 4-pin knot. Starter yarn included, color may vary. Made in USA.

3" long, 1.3" diameter
Recommended for ages 5+

name: Camden Rose - Treasure Chest
description:
This treasure chest is the perfect size for young treasure seekers. With such fine detail and construction, adults will also treasure its quality. Made in USA.

Dimensions:	8.5 inches x 7 inches x 6 inches
Materials: Cherry hardwood, formaldahyde-free leather, rope handles

name: Camden Rose - Convertible Step Stool Chair
description:
This chair/step stool is crafted from solid cherry wood with contrasting walnut plugs. A smoothly operating metal hinge easily converts the step stool to a low chair. Two step heights: 7 inches when open, 13 inches when closed. Made in USA.

Closed Stool Dimension:	13" tall x 12.5" wide x 13" deep
Open Chair Dimension:	7" tall, with an 8" x 11" surface

name: Chronicle Books - Bruno Munari's Zoo
description: Bruno Munari was an internationally acclaimed artist, designer, and children's book creator. A contemporary of Leo Leonni, his books have been hailed as "among the most original, inventive and beautiful ever created." Zoo is among his most graphically stunning works. Meet the kangaroo, who is all legs but doesn't know it, the zebra in his striped pajamas, and the humpy camel, who has a seat for you. Young readers will enjoy Munari's bright, bold illustrations; older readers will appreciate hiswry humor. From children to collectors, Bruno Munari's Zoo is certain to enchant a whole new generation.

name: Chronicle Books - Bruno Munari's ABC
description: Bruno Munari was an internationally acclaimed artist, designer, and children's book creator. A contemporary of Leo Leonni, his books have been hailed as "among the most original, inventive and beautiful ever created." In this imaginative alphabet book, Munari shows how much fun letters can be. From an Ant on an Apple to a Blue Butterfly to a Cat in a Cage, Munari pairs words in whimsical ways until Fly frees itself from its page, lands on the Hat, buzzes near the Ice Cream and provides the final sound for Zzzzz.

name: Chronicle Books - Line 135
description:
Journeys can be life-changing, whether they are literal— traveling from one place to another—or personal, like the quest for self-discovery. This meditative picture book explores both, following a young child on a train ride from the city to the country. As the landscape transforms from a bustling city to a richly imaginative world in this distinctively formatted book, the child’s sense of wonder and independence flourishes, as does a deep engagement with life and the possibilities that lie ahead—making Line 135 a quietly eloquent gift for anyone embarking on their life's journey.

Germano Zullo is an author and poet who lives in Geneva, Switzerland.
Albertine has contributed illustrations to numerous books. She teaches at the school of Visual Arts in Geneva.

name: Chronicle Books - Inside Outside
description:
What is happening outside today? Peek through the window to find out. What is happening inside? Peek again! Whimsical die-cuts throughout lead to charming and surprising reveals with every turn of the page. Filled with fun details (can you find the two mice playing throughout?), this deceptively simple book is one readers will visit again and again.

Lizi Boyd has written and illustrated many children’s books and she also creates other works of delight. Her dogs, Olive and Zuli, assisted in the making of this book. She lives in Vermont.

name: Chronicle Books - Rosie Flo's & Johnny Joe's Coloring Books
description: Welcome to the world of Rosie Flo, yours to fill with your colors and creativity! These unique coloring books boast pages full of whimsy just waiting for young artists to create the characters to inhabit them. Thick paper stock prevents colors from showing through to the other side, and the trim size is more compact than ordinary coloring books, making this ideal for artists on the go. Creator Roz Streeten is an artist and designer from Bath, England. She was inspired to make the Rosie Flo coloring books after drawing many dresses at the request of her two young daughters, who would then color them in. 7.75 x 7.75", 36 pp Black line drawings throughout Includes 2 perforated postcards Rosie Flo's Coloring Book The first in the series. This wonderful collection of dresses and costumes is just waiting for characters to wear them, and that's where you come in. You create the heads, legs, and arms, and then color and complete each scene any way you imagine it. Rosie Flo's Garden Coloring Book Rosie Flo is having a garden party, and the wonderful clothes are all here. You're invited to join in the fun by creating just the right character to wear each costume. Look for dresses inspired by flowers and plants of all sorts and some charming fairies and gnomes, too! Rosie Flo's Animal Coloring Book A zebra dress, a peacock skirt, a spiderweb gown, giraffe boots, and many other fantastic creations await you in this animal-themed Rosie Flo coloring book. You add the heads, legs, and arms for each costume, and then color the characters, their animals, and their surroundings any way as you see fit. You decide exactly how these wild fashions will come to life! Rosie Flo's Travel Coloring Book A whirlwind world tour, showcasing illustrations of international cities and popular vacation destinations. This jet-setting collection of dresses, costumes, and accessories is your ticket to hours of amusement. Just add color and inspiration! Johnny Joe's Coloring Book Johnny Joe's is a fresh companion to the series and features engaging scenes that appeal to boys and girls. Add heads, legs, and arms to characters in a variety of exciting scenes featuring dinosaurs, robots, a futuristic city, sports, trains, and more!

name: Soopsori - Magnetic Wooden Alphabet
description:
These ABC blocks with embedded magnets are made of natural wood with a linseed finish. A beautiful way to teach letters and spelling. Try them out on the fridge or a cookie sheet!

Ages 3+

name: Soopsori - Wooden Cars & Tool Kit
description:
This wonderful set for little tinkerers includes three vehicles and the tools and accessories needed to tow (with magnetic hookup), change wooden "tires," switch out the drivers... Great for pretend play and fine motor development. 

Ages 3+

name: Pluto - All You Need Is Love
description: For Chicago-based Pluto, tee shirts are the perfect canvas. They are art that takes itself not too seriously– art that is fun, and can be worn by kids the world over. This longtime Green Genes favorite features a bright Beatles screenprint in pink or green on black organic cotton (sizes up to 6-12 are onesies, larger sizes are t-shirts).

name: Ecojot - Sketchbooks
description:
Founded by brother and sister team Mark and Carolyn Gavin in 2007, Ecojot creates eco-friendly paper goods that feature whimsical and inspirational designs.

- Available in 6x9" or 9x12" size
- 60 blank sheets, spiral-bound
- All paper and board is made from 100% post-consumer waste
- Printed and designed in Canada

name: Merle & Velma - Personalized Birth Story Keepsake Blanket
description: A modern twist on the classic keepsake. Each blanket is personalized just for baby and digitally printed on the softest organic cotton. Each blanket is generously sized at 30" x 34". Printed with non-toxic water based dyes and made in the USA. Only the best for baby! Perfect for photo props, nursery decor, stroller blanket, nursing cover, and more. This is sure to be a family favorite for years to come. Turnaround Time: About 2.5 weeks Care: Machine washable. A small amount of shrinkage is normal after the first washing. Please include the following notes at checkout in the "Notes to Seller" field, or contact us by email at info@green-genes.com: - Name - Date of Birth - Time of Birth - Weight at Birth (include pounds & ounces) - Height at Birth Available styles: Cohen, Joseph, Margot, Ruby Please note that the images provided are intended as a preview. Adjustments for layout, sizing and spacing will be made before printing to accommodate the personalized text.

name: Merle & Velma - Personalized Keepsake Blanket
description: A modern twist on the classic keepsake. Each blanket is personalized just for baby and digitally printed on the softest organic cotton. The blanket is generously sized at 30" x 34". Printed with non-toxic, water-based dyes and made in the USA. Only the best for baby! Perfect for photo props, nursery decor, stroller blanket, nursing cover, and more. This is sure to be a family favorite for years to come. Turnaround Time: About 2.5 weeks Care: Machine washable. A small amount of shrinkage is normal after the first washing. Please include the baby's name at checkout in the "Notes to Seller" field, or contact us by email at info@green-genes.com. Available styles: Carly, Olivia, Samy, Elijah, Henry, Smith Please note that the images provided are intended as a preview. Adjustments for layout, sizing and spacing will be made before printing to accommodate the personalized text.

name: Apple & Bee - Reversible Satchel
description:
This reversible, messenger-style organic cotton bag is perfect for kids and grownups alike. Light and compact enough for little ones to carry, but roomy enough for folders, books, snacks, a change of clothes... whatever the day calls for. And with an adjustable strap (up to about 47"), there's nothing to stop mom from snagging one for herself!

Organic cotton with wooden details & zip pocket
Measures appx. 10" x 11" x 2"
Strap drop 12-23"

name: Apple & Bee - Library Bag
description:
While these bags were specifically designed to carry books, they'll fit folders and lunch containers for grade schoolers, snacks and a change of clothes for the preschool set... and with an interior pocket and adjustable strap (up to about 50"), they also make great day bags for grownups! We hope you love this one as much as we do.
 
12.20 x 14.7", strap drop 12-24"
100% organic cotton

name: Petit Collage - Deluxe Bamboo Mobile
description:
A modern addition to any child’s room, this Petit Collage transportation mobile is laser-cut from sustainably harvested bamboo plywood, an earth-friendly renewable resource. This deluxe bamboo mobile also features 100% wool felt pieces that easily slot into place adding a pop of color to the room.

Includes: 1 each of hot air balloon, rocket, helicopter and plane, four colored felt accents, hanging stick and string. Laser-cut from food-grade safe bamboo. Comes fully assembled. 

DIMENSIONS: 
Mobile hangs approximately 20".

name: Petit Collage - Paper Strand Mobile
description:
Brighten up even the tiniest spaces with these colorful Petit Collage mobiles!

Featuring art on both sides and designed to gently move, this playful mobile adds interest to any room in the modern home. 

Mobiles come ready-to-hang! Hangs approximately 3 feet.

name: Petit Collage - Modern Doll
description:
Merry and lovable, these witty dolls are destined to become family heirlooms.

100% organic linen-cotton with polyester fill and 100% wool felt arms. Back of doll has same pattern as legs. 

Measures: 19.5"x5"

name: Deuz - French-English Alphabet Flash Cards
description:
Deuz created these 26 bilingual ABC flash cards to discover the upper and lower case letters by playing with pictures.
The drawings on the front side are clues for what is on the back.

These cards are printed in France on recycled cardboard and measure 3.5 X 5.5 in.

name: Kid O - Deep in the Forest
description:
Part play theater and part brainteaser, this forest exercises imaginations and depth perception. Children can make up their own stories or use the cards included; the challenge is to determine which animal is standing deeper in the forest. Comes with a summer and winter backdrop.

Includes: 16 Wooden Play Pieces, 1 Two-Sided Wooden Backdrop, 1 Wooden Tray, 12 Two-Sided Plastic Matching Cards, 1 Cotton Storage Bag

Ages 3+

Package dimensions: 14in. L x 10in. W x 6in. H

name: Seedling - Design Your Own Musical Recorder
description:
This kit contains everything you need to make a unique wooden recorder for your next performance, with artist-quality paints and paint brush ready to go! 

Recommended for Ages 5+ years

name: Seedling - Jump Rope
description: Skipping rope with wooden handles, 3.5in. L x 2in. W x 5.3in. H. (Rope length roughly 80".) Recommended for ages 5+ Fox Skip into the forest and have fun with your foxy friend in hand! Ice Cream Absolutely everyone loves ice cream! Have it in hand and skip skip skip.

name: Seedling - Nature Bingo
description:
Play Bingo in the backyard with 4 different wooden bingo boards. Spot the items and cross them off your bingo boards. 

This Seedling Kit contains: 4 Wooden Seedling Bingo Boards, Chalk & Instructions 

Recommended for Ages 5+ years

name: Tegu - Magnetic Blocks - Cube Sleeve - Nelson
description: The Cube Sleeve is fun on its own, great for the desk, or a pivotal add-on to any existing Tegu set. Tegu cubes represent the most versatile shape in Tegu's building system and will provide hours of building fun. Includes 4 cubes Origin: Designed in the USA, purposefully made in Honduras. Materials: Eco-friendly, FSC-certified Honduran hardwoods. Safe, non-toxic, water-based lacquers (for colors and clear coats). As a vertically-integrated company, Tegu intimately knows its supply chain and suppliers. Size: Package dimensions are 6 x 4 x 4 inches. Weight is 0.5 lbs. Individual block sizes: Cube is 1.18 x 1.18 x 1.18 in. Ages 0+ Warning: This product contains small magnets. Swallowed magnets can cause complications leading to serious infections and death. Seek immediate medical attention if magnets are swallowed or inhaled.

name: Tegu - Magnetic Wooden Wheels - Set of 4
description:
The perfect companion for any Tegu Block set! Four magnetic wooden wheels integrate seamlessly with any existing set of Tegu Blocks to mobilize any creation for hours of fun. 

Ages 3+

Warning: This product contains small magnets. Swallowed magnets can cause complications leading to serious infections and death. Seek immediate medical attention if magnets are swallowed or inhaled.

name: Ammo Books - Modern Art Coloring Books
description:
Modern illustrations are gracefully translated here into 32 black-and-white line drawings for young, budding artists to interpret in their own color palettes. As a reference, the back cover shows every one of the 32 images featured in their full-color original versions. 

Each drawing is printed on white paper on one side to help keep markers from bleeding through to another image. Each page is also perforated at the top for easy removal to place your young artist's artwork on the wall or refrigerator!

9 x 12 inches, 32 B&W Line Drawings/64 pages

options.name: Patrick Hruby Natural Wonders Coloring Book

name: Laura Doherty - Kids in the City & Shining Like a Star
description: Popular Chicago musician and friend of Green Genes, Laura Doherty, presents two albums of breezy folk-pop that are written for kids, and still parent-friendly. It's not just "kids' music," but real music that's fun for the whole family to listen to! Kids in the City, her first CD, is perfect for the "urban toddler" and features plenty of Chicago shout-outs ("El Train," "Hot Dog," "Wheels in the City," and more). A Parent's Choice Gold Award winner and Nappa Gold Award winner! Track List: I Spy Kitty Cat Hot Dog Uncle Ukulele's Band Rockin' at the Zoo Farmer's Market Hello Hippopotamus Wheels in the City El Train Raindrops Keep Fallin' on My Head Uno Dos Tres Elevator Escalator Sweet Home Chicago Firefly Shining Like a Star, Laura's second album, was rated 4 stars in Time Out Chicago, and is a Parent's Choice Silver award-winner. Check out Green Genes' cameo in the video for one of our favorite tracks, the swingin' "Valentine"! Track List Shining Like a Star Rocket Ship I'm a Tree Quiet as a Mouse Hula Hoop Vegetable Party Jake the Snake Valentine Popcorn Sing Tap Dance Ferris Wheel Goodbye Song

name: Mini Rodini - Panther Cardigan
description:
A perfect cardigan in an essential print: panthers! Fun and wild in soft sweat material made from organic cotton.

Features soft rib at cuff, neckhole and bottom. Button closure and two pockets at front.

Composition: 95% organic cotton 5% spandex. GOTS certified.

name: Mini Rodini - Budgie Baby Helmet
description: Pilot hat featuring budgies (parrots) print in cerise and orange with ties under chin. 100% organic cotton. One size, fits approximately 0-6 months.

name: Mini Rodini - Bodysuits
description:
Soft, ribbed short sleeve onesies in an array of prints and solids, made from 100% organic cotton. Snaps at crotch. Solids feature panda label at front. Patterns available in bugdies (parrots) and large graphic and all-over "Bon Voyage" teddy bear prints.

Comfortable and versatile, to mix and match.

Composition: 100% organic cotton, GOTS certified.

name: Mini Rodini - Basic Dress
description:
Short sleeve dress in organic cotton with two front pockets.  Great for mixing and matching.

Composition: 1x1 rib 100% organic cotton. GOTS certified.

name: Mini Rodini - Panda Rib Tee
description:
This soft, ribbed short sleeved tee in is made from super soft 100% organic cotton. Solids feature panda label at front. Comfortable and versatile, to mix and match every day.

Composition: 1x1 rib 100% organic cotton, GOTS certified.

name: Mini Rodini - French Terry Sweat Skirt
description:
Dashing orange sweat skirt in super soft french terry. It has elastic, soft rib and functioning drawstring at waist for extra comfort and perfect fit.

Composition: 77% modal 23% organic cotton. GOTS certified.

name: Mini Rodini - Racerback Tank
description:
A soft tank top with an all-over, sunny summer print. Available in orange palm trees on beige, blue & turquoise budgies (parrots) on white, and rainbow "multipanda" print on white.

Sizes 3-6 and 6-12 months snap at shoulder for easier dressing.

Composition: 1x1 rib 100% organic cotton GOTS certified

name: Mini Rodini - French Terry Sweat Shorts
description:
Super stylish sweat shorts in bright green, soft french terry. The perfect pair of shorts for spring & summer! Soft rib at leg-opening and waist, and drawstring for comfort and the perfect fit.

Composition: 77% modal, 23% organic cotton, GOTS certified.

name: Mini Rodini - Leggings
description:
Super stylish leggings in solids and all-over prints. Solid basics available in cerise, navy, and orange. Prints available in orange palm trees on beige; cerise, orange, & yellow budgies on beige; "Bon Voyage" nautical teddy bears; doves on purple; rabbits on beige; and rabbits on green. 

Soft, 100% organic cotton, elastic waist and cuff at bottom leg for perfect fit and extra comfort.

Composition: 1x1 rib 100% organic cotton. GOTS certified.

name: Mini Rodini - Rabbits Tee
description:
Long sleeved T-shirt with rabbit print. 

Composition: 1x1 rib 100% organic cotton. GOTS certified

name: Mini Rodini - Beanies
description:
Double-layered caps in 1x1 rib 100% organic cotton jersey. GOTS certified.

Sizes reflect head circumference in cm; 44/46 fits roughly 0-9 months, 48/50 fits roughly 9-18 months.

name: Mini Rodini - Giraffe Sun Hat
description:
A stylish cotton sun hat in tan with brown or orange giraffe spots. Cute and protective-- an essential summer piece!


Composition: 100% organic cotton, GOTS certified.

Sizes reflect head circumference in cm; 44/46 fits roughly 0-9 months, 48/50 fits roughly 9-18 months.

name: Keeki Pure & Simple - Nail Polish & Remover
description: Fun water-based, non-toxic polish for kids & grownups. Nail Polish & Top Coat, 0.5 fl. oz. This 100% biodegradable, water-based formula is non-toxic, gluten-free & free from pthalates, formaldehyde, and toluene. Keeki Pure and Simple's polish is the safest on the planet, so there's no damage done to your nails or the environment! Top coat dries clear. Colors marked with an asterisk (*) are neon! Colors may vary from screen to screen-- contact us if you'd like more information on how a color appears in person. Note: Since this polish is water-based, to keep it intact, avoid submersion in cold water for 15 to 20 minutes and washing and shampooing in hot soapy water for an hour or so. Multiple thin coats recommended for longevity (let dry between coats). Ingredients: Water, acrylate copolymer emulsion, glycol ethers. May contain mica (CI 77019), red (CI 15850), blue (CI 77007), white (CI 77891), green (CI 77289) or black (CI 77499) pigments. Base Coat, 0.5 fl. oz. This 100% biodegradable formula is completely non-toxic, gluten-free & free from pthalates, formaldehyde, and toluene. Keeki Pure and Simple's polish is the safest on the planet, so there's no damage done to your nails or the environment! Base coat is recommended for use on fingernails only. Apply to tips of fingernails only. Not recommended for use on young children as it can make nail polish difficult to remove. Ingredients: Corn alcohol, acrylate copolymer emulsion. Nail Polish Remover Say goodbye to stinky nail polish remover... Keeki's smells like coconut! Keeki Pure and Simple Nail Polish Remover is safe to use and contains none of the harsh solvents, such as acetone, that could harm you or our atmosphere. Made with Aloe Vera & Vitamin E, this conditioning formula protects your nails and cuticles. Note: Avoid contact with mucous membranes & do not let young children use without supervision. Ingredients: Corn alcohol, butyl diglycol, Aloe Vera extract, Vitamin E, embittering agent.

name: Shampoodle - Pixel Sweater
description:
Sweatshirt top in grey melange organic cotton. Lion print on chest.

Composition: 100% GOTS certified organic cotton

name: Shampoodle - Street Pants
description:
Organic stretch french terry sweatpants. Relaxed top and tapered ankles. Dropped crotch, faux fly. Slant side pockets & velcro flap on back pocket. Hidden elastic in waistband. Canvas knee patch detail. 

Composition: 96% GOTS certified organic cotton, 4% elastane

name: Shampoodle - Everyday Leggings
description:
Soft legging in organic cotton interlock. Faux fly with buttons. 

Composition: 96% GOTS certified organic cotton, 4% elastane

name: Shampoodle - Weekday Tee
description:
Soft tee in organic cotton jersey. Slight V-neck, black and off-white stripes. 

Composition: 100% GOTS certified organic cotton

name: Shampoodle - Bounce Skort
description:
Soft tiered flounce skirt combined with shorts in organic cotton jersey. Hidden elastics in waistband. Available in black & off white stripes and orange melange.

Composition: 100% GOTS certified cotton

name: Shampoodle - Melon Tank
description: Light racerback tank top in organic cotton jersey. Apricot-colored melon graphic at front. Decorative apricot stitching. Composition: 100% GOTS certified cotton Note- we've observed the neck on this top to be a bit on the smaller side; it may not be the best fit for kiddos with a larger-than-average head. Contact us if you've got questions about the measurements.

name: Yummy Earth - Organic Lollipops
description: Yummy Earth organic candy is a true gourmet experience for families of all ages. The best lollipop we've ever had! Certified organic and kosher, they're made with real fruit extracts-- and no gluten, tree-nuts, peanuts, GMOs, dairy, soy, or artificial colors/dyes. Made in a nut-free facility. Fruit Lollipops: Mango Tango, Pomegranate Pucker, Tooberry Blueberry, Wet-Face Watermelon Super Sour Pops: Strawberry Smash, Sour Apple Tart, Googly Grape, Very Very Cherry 15 pops, net wt. 3 oz. Ingredients: Evaporated cane juice*, tapioca syrup* and/or rice syrup*, citric acid (from beet sugar), natural flavors, may contain black carrots*, apple*, wheat grass*, black currant*, carrot*, pumpkin* *Indicates certified organic

name: Love Mae - Dress Up Doll Fabric Wall Decals
description:
These gorgeous girls are made to be played with - dress them and change their shoes, hats, dresses, blouses, trousers, headdresses and hairstyles as many times as you like! Please note, they need to be loved and played with carefully as they are very special.

Love Mae's delightful fabric wall stickers are lovingly designed with the finer details in mind. Their gorgeous decals can be applied to any smooth surface, and if you change your mind you can whip the decals off neatly and move them around as much as you like. 

Doll height: about 13.5"
Sheet size: about 16.5" x 11"

name: Love Mae - Mini Fabric Decal Stickers
description:
Stick on laptops, notebooks, lunch boxes, mobile phones, furniture, in your car, and, well, just about anywhere. Their cute size make them easy to use in almost any place you can think of. Love Mae's gorgeous decals can be applied to any smooth surface; if you change your mind you can whip the decals off neatly and move them around as much as you like.

All of Love Mae's lovely stickers are made of adhesive fabric. They are super easy to use, just peel from the sheet and stick on the wall... or wherever! Removable and completely reusable. They can be scrunched into a ball and will easily un-scrunch and re-apply, many times over. They're printed with eco-friendly inks and are non-toxic. 

Sheet Size : 160mm x 230mm (6.25" x 9", appx")

(Assembled tree approx. 190 x 150mm (7.5" x 6"); doll 60 x 224mm (2.3 x 8.8"); monsters vary, about 3" to 5" assembled)

name: Crayon Rocks
description:
Crayon Rocks are all-natural soy wax crayons made from USA-grown soybeans and colored with mineral pigments. The colors are vibrant and can be layered to make beautifully textured art work. The shape allows small fingers to color in large, wide strokes creating pictures rich in color.

These crayons were designed to strengthen the tripod grip muscles (preparing children's fingers for handwriting), and are used by occupational therapists to develop fine motor skills. 


16 colors in a muslin bag: red, pink, blue, sky, green, grass, eggyolk yellow, sunlight yellow, orange, peach, purple, light purple, brown, tan, black, gray.

name: Chronicle Books - Taro Gomi Activity Books
description: Renowned children's book illustrator Taro Gomi invites kids of all ages to color, draw, imagine, and create. Play All Day 8-1/4 x 11-3/4 in; 128 pp Children can punch out more than 60 fantastic card stock playthings, including ring-toss games, finger puppets, boxes, picture frames, a zoo's worth of animals, and more! Packed with Gomi's fun, accessible artwork and a delightful variety of games and toys, this book will appeal to children of all ages, engaging their imaginations and entertaining them all day long. Doodles: A Really Giant Coloring and Doodling Book (368 pp) Squiggles: A Really Giant Drawing and Painting Book (204 pp) Scribbles: A Really Giant Drawing and Coloring Book (368 pp) 8-1/4 x 11-11/16 in Unfinished pictures and intriguing, open-ended, easy-to-follow prompts foster children's powers of visualization and provide plenty of room to stretch the imagination. Doodle 123: A Really Giant Doodling and Drawing Book 11-3/4 x 8-1/4 in; 240 pp Here, Taro Gomi's creative prompts make for innovative ways to teach numbers and counting, while taking children's imagination and artistic skills for a spin! Happy Doodle Book 5 1/4 x 5 in; 288 pages Toss this go-anywhere doodle book in a purse or a backpack, leave them in the back of the car, or tote them onto the plane for an instant mood adjustment or cure for boredom. Draw a happy-looking cake, a grumpy teapot, a laughing frog, and more! No matter what their age, doodlers will appreciate Taro Gomi’s wit and the opportunity to create whenever the mood strikes! Pages are fuchsia throughout. Scribble It! 30 Postcards 4-3/4 x 6-1/2 in Share your scribbles with the world! This book of tear-out post cards invites you to doodle and draw in 30 mail-able ways with playful prompts and open-ended artwork. Perfect for artists of every kind, whether at home or on the road!

name: Deuz - Tapikid Organic Playmat
description:
Bright, fun, interactive play mats for kids, made with durable, 100% organic cotton canvas. A beautiful playscape with tons of possibility!

•Made in 100% certified organic cotton, by a company using fair trade practices (under direct, regular supervision by Deuz), and printed with non toxic inks.
•Unfolded, the TAPIKID measure 49.2 X 49.2" (comes folded)
•Easily folded and taken away in its little organic tote bag!
•The heavy canvas is resistant and machine washable at 40°.
•Before first use, to preserve the brightness of colors, we recommend that you soak your Tapikid for one night in cold water with 4 cups of salt.
•CE tested in a French lab, who validates they are suitable for kids all of ages.

name: Tree Hopper Toys - Hopper Jalopies
description:
This all-natural, multi-purpose Hopper Jalopy is a great rattle and grasping toy, and it's perfect to chase around! Made from fantastic midwestern hardwoods, this Hopper Jalopy is beautifully fun. 

Each piece is super smooth and lightly finished with Tree Hopper Toys' 100% natural, custom beeswax blend, allowing you peace of mind while the kid in your life shakes, rattles, and rolls to their heart's content!

Each Jalopy is about 2 1/4" wide, 6" long, and 3 1/2"-5 1/2" high.

name: Tree Hopper Toys - Yo-Yo
description:
YO! It's simple, fun and classic.  

Pick up this all natural wooden yo-yo and you'll be on your way to walking the dog around the world in a cat's cradle!  

One side of  the yo-yo has Tree Hopper Toys' "YO!" print, the other side has your choice of a friendly monster, a submarine, an airplane, or a spaceship.  Hand printed and lightly finished with a custom beeswax blend.

name: Erbaviva - Mommy Bath & Body
description: Mommy-to-be Milk Bath This USDA Certified Organic Milk Bath uses skin-soothing properties of milk combine with essential oils of lavender and lemon to create the divine bathing moment every mother deserves, relieving tummy dryness in a heavenly scented bath. Organic milk powder, sea salt, essential oils of lavender, and lemon 24 oz (680g) Refreshing Foot Balm Erbaviva's Refreshing Foot Balm doesn't just smell great and warm the skin, it has essential oils of grapefruit and cypress to help stimulate circulation while relieving swollen feet with ginger, cypress and lavender. Petroleum-free and almost 100% organic, Mommy can rub in this foot balm several times a day. Organic shea butter, organic sunflower seed oil, organic beeswax, organic grapefruit peel oil, organic cypress oil, organic lavander flower oil, organic sandalwood, organic ginger root extract, organic geranium flower oil, organic rosemary leaf extract 1.75oz (50 g.) USDA Certified Organic with essential oils of lavender, mandarin, sandalwood, and rose. Erbaviva Belly Butter will take care of you while you prepare to take care of your new family. Helianthus annuus (sunflower) oil, theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, cera alba (beeswax), rosemarinus officinalis (rosemary) extract, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) oil, citrus nobilis (mandarin) oil, santalum spicatum (sandalwood) oil, pelargonium graveolens (rose geranium) flower oil, rosa damascena (rose) flower oil. 4 oz Quease Ease Lip Balm This great lip balm that fits easily in your pocket or purse is perfect for calming mommy’s queasy stomach. name: Erbaviva - Baby Bath & Body
description: Baby Cream Erbaviva's light and natural Baby Cream is carefully made from very high quality natural ingredients. Using completely natural emulsifiers and organic moisturizing oils, they've made a cream that is both super-clean and light, while nourishing to the most tender baby skin. Lightly scented with Erbaviva's blend of organic lavender and chamomile essential oils. 4.2 oz (125g) *Aloe barbadensis leaf juice, *helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, glycerin, glyceryl stearate, cetyl alcohol, stearic acid, tocopheryl acetate, *butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), hyaluronic acid, *theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, myristyl myristate, panthenol, allantoin, soy lecithin, xanthan gum, polyamino- propyl biguanide, *lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower oil, *anthemis nobilis (chamomile) flower oil, **linalool. *denotes certified organic ingredient. **denotes component of certified organic ingredient. Baby Oil Delicately scented with mandarin, Erbaviva's Organic Baby Oil is indispensable in caring for baby's skin. Use it after the bath for hydration and protection, use it in the diaper area to keep skin clean and balanced, or use it on baby's tender cheeks in cold weather. Studies have documented that human touch is critical for a baby to thrive. Supplement your loving cuddles with baby massage using Erbaviva Baby Oil. Baby massage can be an integral part of you and your baby's daily regimen, a meaningful and tender way for the two of you to bond. 4 fl. oz (125ml) Organic almond oil, organic safflower oil, organic jojoba oil, organic rosemary extract, vitamin E, organic essential oils of mandarin and roman chamomile. Children's Sunscreen Erbaviva's mission has been to create an all-natural sunscreen, one with the highest possible SPF, without using any synthetic ingredients. This is a cream you can feel completely safe in applying to your children's skin. Lightly scented with organic lavender and chamomile essential oils. Ideal as a sunscreen for adults as well, particularly when you are concerned about the products you put on your skin. 2.5 fl oz (75 ml) Active Ingredient- Zinc Oxide, *Aloe barbadensis leaf juice, *anthemis nobilis (chamomile) flower oil, caprylic/capric triglycerides, *helinathus annuus (sunflower) see oil, hydrogenated methyl abietate, *lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower oil, magnesium sulfate, *olea europaea (olive) fruit oil, polyaminopropyl biguanide, polyglycerol-10 laurate, ricinus communis (castor) seed oil, *simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, sorbitan stearate, tocopherol, water. *denotes certified organic ingredient Sniffles Organic Baby Balm Now you can help ease baby's cough and cold symptoms with organic essential oils of eucalyptus, tea tree, and myrrh. Cypress essential oil also helps deliver natural healing and antiviral ingredients into baby's chest, back and neck when they don’t feel well. Erbaviva's new chest balm is petroleum-free and almost 100% organic. 1.75 oz (50 g) Organic sunflower oil, organic shea butter, organic beeswax, organic jojoba seed oil, organic eucalyptus radiata, organic lavender flower oil, organic cedar bark oil, organic grapefruit peel oil, organic cypress leaf/nut/stem oil, organic myrrh extract, organic geranium flower oil, organic tea tree leaf oil, organic rosemary leaf extract, organic immortelle extract, organic calendula flower extract. Baby Shampoo Erbaviva Baby Shampoo uses a unique and mild blend of Oregon grape extract for added benefit to the scalp and organic essential oils, making their shampoo as mild and natural as is possible. Gentle enough for newborns, great for the whole family. Also ideal for people with sensitive skin. While the shampoo is free from all harsh and harmful detergents, it lathers beautifully with the help of quillaja (extract from the soap bark tree). 175 ml/ 6 fl. oz. Water, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, decyl glucoside, glycerin, chondrus crispus (carrageenan), quillaja saponaria bark extract, mahonia aquifolium (Oregon grape) root extract, citric acid, sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, *lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower oil, *anthemis nobilis (chamomile) flower oil,**linolool. *denotes certified organic ingredient **denotes component of certified organic ingredient Baby Soap Probably the mildest soap you will find, made with love and care to delicately nurture you or your baby's tender skin. Non-drying to the skin, extra mild for all skin types. 4 oz (110g) Water, olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, sodium hydroxide, milk, honey, lavender essential oil. Buzz Spray Meeting the highest standards of USDA and Biodynamic certifications this spray can be used without worry of harsh chemicals and mysterious synthetics.
