(75ml) De-ionized water, zinc oxide, organic almond oil, avocado oil, cetearyl wheat bran glycosides, and cetearyl alcohol, echinacea extract, lecithin, algae extract, beeswax, allantoin, sodium hydroxymethylglycinate (preservative at only 0.3%), organic essential oils of lavender and roman chamomile Baby Travel Canvas Kit Erbaviva understands that baby’s delicate skin needs safe and natural protection wherever they are. This Baby Travel Kit will keep baby clean, fresh and moisturized during any trip. The kit includes four necessities: organic Baby Lip & Cheek Balm (full size), Baby Lotion, Baby Shampoo and Diaper Cream; zipped up in an easy-to-grab pouch! Now you can nurture baby with natural and organic ingredients anywhere you go.

name: Seedling - Make Your Own Kaleidoscope
description:
Build and create your own optical prism with endless possibilities! You are the master of what you see inside and outside, with your own unique designs. 
This Seedling Kit contains: cardboard tubes, plastic mirror pieces, assorted beads, rhinestones, adhesive paper, foil confetti pieces, craft glue, & instructions.

Recommended for ages 6+

name: Seedling - Create a Wooden People Family
description:
Create your own little family of people ready for any adventure!
This Seedling Kit contains: wooden dolls, fabric pieces, felt pieces, craft glue, coloured pencils & instructions.

Recommended for ages 4+

name: Seedling - Design Your Own Superhero Cape
description:
Who is the greatest superhero of all? Create your own superhero character and design your signature cape. The sky's the limit (that's if your super power is flying)! 
This Seedling Kit contains: plain superhero cape, craft glue & brush, foam sheets & stars, felt sheets & shapes, coloured pencils, design page, glitter glue & tips for your design.

Recommended for ages 4+

name: Seedling - Design Your Own Box Kite
description:
Design your own kite and see it flying high in the sky! This Seedling Kit contains: box kite, fabric paints, glitter glue & instructions.

Recommended for ages 5+

name: Natursutten - Orthodontic Pacifier
description:
Natursutten pacifiers are a safe choice for your baby because they're 100% natural rubber, with no BPA, pthalates, or PVC.

•	Follows baby’s natural mouth movements
•	Does not leave marks on baby’s face
•	Have shown incredible strength in the “stretch-test”
•	Environment friendly and biodegradable

Made in Italy

name: LifeFactory - Silicone Teethers - Pack of 2
description:
Multi-Sensory Silicone Teether is soft, lightweight and easy for little fingers to hold.

Includes two teethers: Yellow & Spring Green, Sky & Spring Green, or Pink & Lilac.

-BPA, phthalate, PVC, and latex free.
-Can be worn as a bracelet so it is always close by.
-Can be refrigerated or frozen to soothe aching gums.
-Various ribs and nubs are fun for baby to explore and help to develop oral motor skills.
-Dishwasher safe.
-Made in the USA of medical grade silicone.

name: LifeFactory - Bottle Accessories
description: All components BPA- and phthlatate-free. Multi-Colored Flat Cap Set Bright colored caps make it fun and easy to personalize your 9 oz glass beverage bottles. Perfect for beverages, snacks, or other precious items you want to keep clean. You can convert your 4 oz baby bottle into a snack container and your 9 oz baby bottle into a juice container as your child grows. (Bottle not included) Pack of 4, includes Ocean, Orange, Royal Purple, and Spring Green. Made in the U.S. Sippy Cap Set Great for toddlers, these sippy caps are leak resistant and have steady flow control. The caps quickly convert 4 oz and 9 oz baby bottles into sippy bottles as your child grows. (Bottle not included.) Cap made in Poland. Silicone valve made in the U.S. Includes 2 caps - choose Raspberry & Royal Purple or Ocean & Spring Green. Silicone Nipples Pack of 2 standard-neck silicone nipples. Made in France.

options.name: Sippy Cap Set - Raspberry & Royal Purple
Sippy Cap Set - Ocean & Spring Green

name: Lifefactory - Glass Baby Bottles
description:
Lifefactory's glass baby bottles are perfect for little hands! The brightly-colored silicone sleeve provides a great grip and tactile experience during feeding.

-Durable-- the borosilicate glass is thermal shock resistant and therefore can go from freezer to boiling water.
-The silicone sleeve helps protect the bottle from the inevitable drop off the stroller or feeding chair.
-Glass is a healthy choice for your family as there is no chance of any chemicals leaking in to liquids.
-The entire product, including all components, is completely free of known toxins including BPA, phthalates, polycarbonates, and PVC.
-The nipples and colorful sleeves are made from medical-grade silicone. Like the bottle, they are non-toxic and free of any plastic or latex.
-Dishwasher safe-- the bottle and sleeve can be boiled or tossed into the dishwasher together. No need to take them apart or fuss with small parts.
-Bottle goes from breast pump, to freezer, to warm water… making breast milk storage simple. Great for mixing and warming formula, too.
-4oz (120 mL) bottle includes Stage 1 (0-3 months) nipple, 9oz (250 mL) bottle includes Stage 2 (3-6 months) nipple
-Adaptable into beverage bottle for toddlers and older children with sippy cap (spring green & ocean or royal purple & raspberry) or flat cap sets.

Glass and silicone nipple made in France; cap and silicone sleeve made in the U.S.; product assembled in the U.S.

name: Areaware - Guthrie Cubebot
description: Robot toys are usually made of plastic and require batteries - but not this one! Inspired by the Japanese Shinto Kumi-ki puzzles, the Cubebot is a non-traditional take on the toy robot by joining ancient Japanese traditions with contemporary toy culture. Cubebots's powerful hardwood frame can hold many poses, and his elastic-band muscles and durable wood limbs make him impervious to breakage. When it’s time for him to rest, he folds into a perfect cube. An enduring classic that will withstand generations of play. Fun to pose for younger kids, tough brainteaser for older kids (and grownups!)-- try to get him back into a cube without looking at the directions! He's a bit harder to figure out than his little cousins, the -Dimensions: 7" x 11" unfolded; 2.5" inch cube folded -Sustainably harvested cherry wood -Recommended for ages 3+

name: Kidsonroof - Totem Pop-Out Cards
description: This card is not just a card, but also a little gift to keep. The pop out card comes with a little note card to write the message on and a beautifully printed envelope. Stork This stork and its little ones make a beautiful accessory on a table, a cupboard or chimney and keeps the message alive. Mandarin Duck This mandarin duck is an explosion of colors! Swimming around with her little ones, she will comfortable any place you put her. Format A5 - weight 56 grams. Made from recycled cardboard.

name: Kidsonroof - Archiville
description:
Houses, mountains, skyscrapers, trees and roads. Colored pieces that you can build into ever-changing city sceneries. There are no rules: houses can be built over houses, trees taller than skyscrapers, and roads can go up vertically or run all around you!  Part of Kidsonroof's Totem collection, Archiville is a city to build, a world that needs to be constantly reinvented. 

4 sheets x A3 size (11.7 x 16.5"), made from recycled cardboard. Recommended age 6+.

name: Kidsonroof - Totem City & Nature
description:
Totem Nature & City are three dimensional building sets made from sturdy cardboard. Construct all 4 models from the manuals included in each set(not all at the same time), or use them for good old-fashioned open-ended building play.

NATURE
130 pieces, reversibly printed with flowers, animals, coins and other prints. Includes manual for 4 models-- a lizard, a deer, a church and a 'witch house'.

CITY
130 pieces, reversibly printed with swords, dragons, secret symbols and textures. Includes manual for 4 models-- a church, a vessel, an airplane and a 'Yak' aircraft.

Recommended for ages 6+ (or kids over 3 with good motor skills, patience, and maybe a grownup or older sibling to help). Made of recycled cardboard.

name: Kidsonroof - Cocorico Cardboard Cooker
description:
A cardboard oven and stove top for the beginning chef. Easy to put together, lightweight to carry around. 

Made of recycled cardboard. 3+

name: Kidsonroof - Casa Cabana
description:
The Casa Cabana playhouse comes partially decorated with a cat on a tree, a small ant, a rabbit and a squirrel-- and more than enough room to color, paint and decorate to make it your own. Surprisingly sturdy!

Appx 2.5" x 31.5" x 24" packaged, 27.5" x 27.5" x 41.5" constructed.
Made of recycled cardboard. Age 3+.

name: Kidsonroof - Teknika
description:
A small present that will never get boring. Great for open-ended pretend play, combining with other play scenes, or for decoration! Part of Kidsonroof's TOTEM collection, a series of sets of interlocking pieces to build & play with.


1 sheet per set, A4 size, made from recycled cardboard. Age 3+.


SPACE
A space station with rockets, an astronaut, spaceships and a radar tower, imagined in 2D pop up illustrations. Move it around, fly it, launch it, play with it...

TRAFFIC
A street full of cars ... a taxi, van, police car, bus, sports car, trailer and policemen, imagined in 2D pop up illustrations. Move them around, cross with them, play!

HARBOR
A harbor with a container ship, a captain, a lighthouse, cranes, a submarine, and cruiseliner; imagined in 2D pop up illustrations. Move them around, navigate them, play with them!

AEROPORT
An airport with airplanes, pilot, flight attendant, and safety car; imagined in 2D pop up illustrations. Move it around, fly it, land it, play with it.

name: Haba - Stroller Toys
description:
Bright, happy beech wood toys designed to hang from a stroller or carrier to keep little ones occupied in transit (toy clip not included). Also makes a great addition to play gyms. 0-12 months.

Fiorella features a bell, a kaleidoscope, and mirror foil. 

Dragolino features pieces to shake, rattle, & pull.

Nilo is a happy hippo with a dangling bell.

name: Haba - Moby Fish Rattle
description:
When shaken, the beech wood discs make a nice rattling sound. Wooden discs are connected by a rubber band.

Recommended for 0-12 months.

name: Maxomorra - Short Sleeved Tee
description:
100% GOTS certified organic cotton.

Note: stripes are part of fabric knit and are present inside and out-- not surface-printed as shown.

name: Maxomorra - Tank Top
description: Sleeveless shirt, GOTS certified 95% organic cotton, 5% elastane. Sized to fit snugly for layering; for a looser fit, you may wish to go up one size.

name: Maxomorra - Baby Shorts
description: 100% GOTS certified organic cotton basic short, great for easy mixing & matching.

name: Winter Water Factory - Solid Leggings
description: Soft organic cotton with elastic waistband. Made in USA!

name: Winter Water Factory - Halter Dress
description: 100% organic cotton tank dress printed with water-based inks. Made in the USA from start to finish!

name: Winter Water Factory - Chelsea Dress
description: 100% organic cotton dress, printed with water-based inks. Made in the USA from start to finish!

name: Winter Water Factory - Short-Sleeved Tee
description: 100% organic cotton t-shirt, printed with water-based inks. Made in the USA from start to finish!

name: Winter Water Factory - Luca Pants
description: Perfect for mixing & matching with graphic tees! Two front pockets, cropped length, 2-6 years. 100% organic cotton, made in USA.

name: Winter Water Factory - Rocking Horse Baby Dress
description: 100% organic cotton baby dress - made in the USA start to finish!

name: Winter Water Factory - Pinwheel Baby Dress
description: 100% organic cotton baby dress - made in USA from start to finish!

name: Winter Water Factory - Luna Baby Dress
description: 100% organic cotton baby dress - made in the USA start to finish!

name: Winter Water Factory - Short-Sleeved Lap Tee
description: Lap tees with an opening for easy dressing. Each all-over pattern is hand-printed on extra soft organic cotton. Made with love in USA.

name: vulli
description: Sophie the Giraffe is an all-natural rubber teething toy, made in France and colored with food-grade pigments. This teether is stimulating to all of baby's senses; the distinctive taste and smell of natural rubber, the bright color, the shape specifically designed for chewing and grasping, and an internal squeaker (which additionally helps to teach the relationship between cause and effect). Great for soothing baby's gums during teething. Like the famous Sophie, her mushroom friends, the Chan Pie Gnons, are made of natural rubber and baby can chew it in complete safety. Easy to grasp and to grip, this toy also includes an internal squeaker. 3 models: Chan (blue), Pie (pink), and Gnon (yellow-green). Made in France, BPA- and phthalate-free, ages 0+

name: Mini Mioche - Comfy Cardi
description: The perfect unisex layering piece – great all year round.  Made with super soft 100% organic cotton jersey.

name: Mini Mioche - Paradise Polo
description:
Our super cool vintage inspired polo tee with raw edge detail.  Great layered with a long sleeve tee or onesie!
Made of our soft 100% organic cotton. Stripes made with 75% organic cotton, 25% PES.

name: Mini Mioche - Buck Shorts
description: The buck short is possibly the coolest boys' short ever! Super comfy for all sorts of summer fun. 100% organic cotton.

name: Mini Mioche - Beloved Bloomie Short
description: Cool and comfy girls short with front pockets and natural wood button detail. Made of 100% organic cotton jersey.

name: Nohi - Short Sleeved Tee
description:
Made with super soft and cozy organic fabric, 50% certified organic cotton, 48% fiber from bamboo, and 2% lycra. Contrast stitching.

Graphics printed with water-based ink. Runs slightly small, those between sizes may wish to size up.

name: Mini Rodini - Panda Sweatpants
description:
Trouser in soft, brushed organic cotton fleece with elastic and functioning drawstring at waist, rib at cuff and all-over panda print. 

Composition: 95% organic cotton 5% spandex. GOTS certified.

name: Mini Rodini - Big Stripe Wing Tee
description: Rib knit tee in red and khaki stripes with ruffle detail at shoulder. Snaps at right shoulder for easier dressing. 95% GOTS certified organic cotton, 5% elastane.

name: Mini Rodini - Anchor Dress
description: Slouchy cream dress with seam at back and painterly anchor print. 95% GOTS certified organic cotton, 5% elastane.

name: Winter Water Factory - Sunny Meadow Pants
description: 100% organic cotton french terry pant with an adorable all-over flower print and elastic at back of waistband for the perfect fit. Made with love in Brooklyn.
